A case study of Otter.ai

Last week, I wrote about Otter.ai‚Äôs onboarding flow.

In the deep dive, I found three things they do really well:

  • üõ†Ô∏è Introduce set-up tasks one by one: turn on meeting notes, sync calendar and invite team ‚Äî ‚Äî all covered within 5 mins from landing page
  • üçî Give people a monetisation sandwich: paywall at start and end of onboarding to drive conversion (as well as have a freemium + free trial model)
  • üìÜ Have a leading indicator for activation: calendar sync is pushed so many times, likely correlating with activation & retention later on

When I was writing last week‚Äôs issue, I found there‚Äôs just so much good stuff to analyse. So, I had to do another issue üôÉ

This week we go deeper into the recording tool‚Äôs activation funnel to analyse:

  1. How the Homepage pushes to key tasks without overwhelming
  2. An onboarding checklist that progressively discloses what to do
  3. A tutorial to get users to record ASAP
  4. Some cool GIF demos for prompting their chat search

And a lot more.
